sen.j: 西小路通（にしこうじどおり）は、京都市の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Nishikoji-dori Street is one of the streets in Kyoto running in the north-south direction.
Nishikoji-dori Street is one of the streets in Kyoto running in the north-south direction.
Nishikoji-dori Street is one of the streets in Kyoto running in the north-south direction.

sen.j: 西大路通の西方に位置し、 北は妙心寺通から南は七条通まで。
sen.e: It is located west of Nishioji-dori Street and runs from Myoshinji-dori Street to the north to Shichijo-dori Street to the south.
It is located west of Nishioji-dori Street and runs from Myoshinji-dori Street to the north to Shichijo-dori Street to the south.
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。
